text: Apa sira (Muhammad) durung sumurup marang wong-wong kang padha wis diparingi panduman saka kitab? Dheweke padha percaya marang berhala kang aran Jibti lan Thaghut, sarta padha ngucap marang kancane kang padha kafir, menawa wong-wong mau luwih oleh pituduh marang dalan kang bener ngungkuli wong-wong kang padha percaya
